Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler

Interface ServerMailFromReplyHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ServerReplyHandler
    public interface ServerMailFromReplyHandler
extends ServerReplyHandler
    Handler for MAIL FROM command response.

    This handler receives the server's response to a MAIL FROM command. On success, the handler receives a ClientEnvelope interface for adding recipients to the mail transaction.

    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    ClientSession.mailFrom(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.rfc5322.EmailAddress, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler.ServerMailFromReplyHandler), ClientEnvelope

      • Methods inherited from interface org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler.ServerReplyHandler

        handleServiceClosing

    • Method Detail

      • handleMailFromOk

        void handleMailFromOk​(ClientEnvelope envelope)
        Called when the sender is accepted (250).

        The handler should proceed to add recipients using the provided envelope interface.

        Parameters:
        envelope - operations to add recipients to the transaction

      • handleTemporaryFailure

        void handleTemporaryFailure​(ClientSession session)
        Called when the sender is temporarily rejected (4xx).

        The handler can retry with the same or different sender, or abort. Common reasons include:

        • 450 - Mailbox temporarily unavailable
        • 451 - Local processing error
        • 452 - Insufficient storage
        Parameters:
        session - operations to retry or quit

      • handlePermanentFailure

        void handlePermanentFailure​(java.lang.String message)
        Called when the sender is permanently rejected (5xx).

        The sender address is not acceptable. Common reasons include:

        • 550 - Sender rejected by policy
        • 553 - Mailbox name syntax not allowed
        • 555 - Parameters not recognized
        Parameters:
        message - the server's rejection message
